Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. For this exceptional piece, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
